hadiths.text: Narrated Muhammad bin Jubair bin Mut'im:from his father that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "I have some names: I am Muhammad, I am Ahmad, I am Al-Mahi, the one by whom Allah wipes out disbelief, I am Al-Hasir, the one whom the people are gathered at his feet, and I am Al-'Aqib, the one after whom there is no Prophet
